vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ζωογον-έω,
propagate or engender living creatures, of inanimate substances, ἡ φύσις ζ. [Refs 4th c.BC+] (so in middle, [Refs 4th c.BC+]; of animals, breed, like{ζωοτοκέω}, [Refs 1st c.BC+]:—passive, [Refs 4th c.BC+]: generally, engender [στοιχεῖον] ἕκαστον ἀπὸ ἑτέρου -εῖται [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__II to be viviparous, [Refs 4th c.BC+]; produce alive, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]; ζ. παρθένον, of Zeus, producing Pallas alive from his head, [Refs 1st c.BC+]
__II.2 make alive, quicken, τι [Refs 4th c.BC+]:—passive, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__II.3 ={ζωγρέω}, preserve alive, [LXX]; κύριος θανατοῖ καὶ ζ[NT]:—passive, [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to give life, make alive; to preserve life, keep alive
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to give life, make alive; to preserve life, keep alive
primarily to bring forth living creatures; in NT to preserve alive, save, Lk. 17:33; Acts 7:19; 1Tim. 6:13*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: salvar la vida ; dar vida (Dios) ; (voz pasiva) preservar la vida
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 賦予生命, 使活起來
2) 保存生命 (路 17:33; 徒 7:19)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 赋予生命, 使活起来
2) 保存生命 (路 17:33; 徒 7:19)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: bảo tồn sự sống; ban sự sống
